repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.unittitle: Gente Aprendiendo para Nuevas Oportunidades (GANO) records
did.abstract: Gente Aprendiendo para Nuevas Oportunidades (GANO) is a volunteer student organization that offers free English as a Second Language (ESL) classes to Hispanic adults in the Durham area, and organizes social and educational events for the Latino community in Durham. The Gente Aprendiendo para Nuevas Oportunidades (GANO) records include annual printed and digital scrapbooks, which detail the group's activities for the previous year and include testimonials for the group's work by the student tutors and the tutees, as well as captures of the group's website from 2014-2015.

bioghist.head: Historical note
bioghist.p: Gente Aprendiendo para Nuevas Oportunidades (GANO) is a volunteer student organization that offers free English as a Second Language (ESL) classes to Hispanic adults in the Durham area, and organizes social and educational events for the Latino community in Durham. GANO offers free classes twice a week on Duke University's East Campus, provides free childcare and parking during class times, hosts regular weekly potluck dinners, and organizes additional events including movie nights, computer and internet training, and weekend activities in Durham. Duke University students volunteer as tutors, childcare providers, and organizers.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The Gente Aprendiendo para Nuevas Oportunidades (GANO) records include annual printed and digital scrapbooks, which detail the group's activities for the previous year and include testimonials for the group's work by the student tutors and the tutees. Also included are captures of the group's website from 2014-2015.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright for Official University records is held by Duke University; all other copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The Gente Aprendiendo para Nuevas Oportunidades (GANO) records were received by the University Archives as a gift in 2015-2020.
